results.title: Little effect of ordinary antihypertensive therapy on nocturnal high blood pressure in patients with sleep disordered breathing.
results.text_hl: The antihypertensive effects of four different antihypertensive medications (beta-blocking agent, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 50 mg; @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@-antagonist, isradipine SRO [slow release] 2.5 mg; diuretic, @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@ [@CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@HCTZ@@@] 25 mg; and angiotension converting enzyme-inhibitor, @CHEMICAL_spirapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052555 @@@spirapril@@@ 6 mg) on @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012891 @@@sleep disordered breathing@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ were compared by the ambulatory @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@blood pressure@@@ measurement (ABPM).

citations.NLM: Pelttari LH, Hietanen EK, Salo TT, Kataja MJ, Kantola IM. Little effect of ordinary antihypertensive therapy on nocturnal high blood pressure in patients with sleep disordered breathing. Am J Hypertens. 1998 Mar;11(3 Pt 1):272-9. PMID: 9544866
citations.BibTeX: @article{9544866, title={Little effect of ordinary antihypertensive therapy on nocturnal high blood pressure in patients with sleep disordered breathing.}, author={Pelttari LH and Hietanen EK and Salo TT and Kataja MJ and Kantola IM}, journal={Am J Hypertens}, volume={11}, number={3 Pt 1}, pages={272-9}}

results.title: The effect of four different antihypertensive medications on cardiovascular regulation in hypertensive sleep apneic patients--assessment by spectral analysis of heart rate and blood pressure variability.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The short-term treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012891 @@@sleep apnea syndrome@@@ is associated with normalization of autonomic nervous control judged by heart rate and blood pressure variability.

citations.NLM: Salo TM, Kantola I, Voipio-Pulkki LM, Pelttari L, Viikari JS. The effect of four different antihypertensive medications on cardiovascular regulation in hypertensive sleep apneic patients--assessment by spectral analysis of heart rate and blood pressure variability. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1999 May;55(3):191-8. PMID: 10379634
citations.BibTeX: @article{10379634, title={The effect of four different antihypertensive medications on cardiovascular regulation in hypertensive sleep apneic patients--assessment by spectral analysis of heart rate and blood pressure variability.}, author={Salo TM and Kantola I and Voipio-Pulkki LM and Pelttari L and Viikari JS}, journal={Eur J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={55}, number={3}, pages={191-8}}
